name: Ocarina PD
description:
Ocarina PD  is a musical toy for the playdate where u play every gamers favorite woodwind instrument, the Ocarina. 

Got musical freinds with playdates Play along with PD DRUMS
https://lowtekgames.itch.io/pd-drums

Ocarina PD is a musical toy for the playdate where u play every gamers favourite woodwind instrument, the Ocarina. The app uses a standard 4-6 hole pendant style hole layout with extra notes by tilting at the extremes.  Lowteks founder Alastair Low has been collecting and playing ocarinas since playing Zelda oot and designed a unique control scheme for a playdate app. “I plan on making a few music apps and getting a band together at some point”Ally Low “I was surprised how well it plays” “Hours of fun”

Practice freestyle songs with this pendant style ocarina 

How to play:

Controlls:
Blow into the mic

press no butons and get a high note Tilt up for an extra high note

Hold for your Low note  left, down , b , a Tilt down to get one extra low note

Note chart:

Features:
-Simulates and 4 - 6 hole ocarina 13 notes 
-Transpose to play in different keys
-A selection of skins to chose from
